---
name: Feature Contract Example Request
about: Request a new example Feature Contract for a specific domain or use case
title: "[Example Request] <domain or use case>"
labels: ["example"]
---

## Domain / Industry
Which domain is this example for?
(e.g. Finance, Healthcare, Retail, Public Sector, SaaS, Telecom)

## Use Case
What kind of feature or model is this example intended for?
(e.g. fraud detection, churn prediction, credit scoring, demand forecasting)

## Why This Example Is Valuable
How would this example improve understanding or adoption of Feature Contracts?
Who is the intended audience?

## Key Contract Sections to Emphasize
Are there specific areas that should be highlighted?
(e.g. compliance, time semantics, lineage, drift, security)

## Suggested Feature Description
(Optional but helpful)
Describe the feature in plain English.
What does it represent? How is it used?

## Compliance or Regulatory Considerations
(Optional)
Are there any regulatory, privacy, or governance requirements that should be reflected?
(e.g. HIPAA, GDPR, SOX, CJIS)

## Additional Context
Any other background, references, or constraints that might be useful.
